about_the_game:
a New Take On A Classic Tale


Immerse yourself in the dark and gritty story of Scarlet—an adult Little Red Riding Hood. Arm yourself with cool melee weapons and find out what kind of trouble Ba has gotten into this time.

fight Your Way


Scarlet’s arsenal includes 3 types of melee weapons, each with a unique fighting style and seamless switching, allowing you to slice through enemies to heavy music in your preferred way!

style and Efficiency


Purchase new moves to enhance your combat combinations, increasing the efficiency and style of your weapons to create an even more stylish bloodbath!

key Features Of the Game


  • Dynamic combat system with seamless weapon switching.
  • Long, varied combos and 3 fighting styles.
  • Unique blend of dark fantasy and Victorian era.
  • Heavy music in Metal and Dubstep genres.
  • A story with detective elements and unexpected twists.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work: Adult Content
